trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Salisbury
There were no other sightings in Salisbury on or around November 24th 2009
Summary: Triangle that appeared moved forward and vanished.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe spotted this ufo over the civic center in Salisbury. It just appeared in the sky out of nowhere it moved forward for about 4 seconds and then vanished. It had three lights on it on at each point and two larger ones on the bottom.
